Name: Behold!
About the game: Behold is a 2D twin-stick shooter in a dark fantasy setting ! Barbarians, insane wizards, total despair and bloody pieces. You are playing as a monster who is stuck between two armies. Two kingdoms have been fighting for a hundred years and all means are good to win. A powerful wizard summoned an aberration, but his concentration was broken accidentally. What will happen next? Your monster can hit enemies with different deadly rays, smash them and eat them in one piece. But he has to fight with soldiers, noble knights, brutal barons, elemental mages, necromancers, clerics and enslaved giant creatures. You have to destroy waves of enemies, choose perks , pick power-ups and survive as long as possible!
